page.title: 14ROWLANDS CASTLE ASSOCIATION
page.content: The object of the Association is to conserve the character of Rowlands Castle, to provide a channel of communication on matters of local interest, and to enhance the life of the village by fostering participation in village activities. They concern themselves with such items as the 40% increase in the housing in the parish proposed in the Horndean Area Local Plan, and their representations (through the Parish Council) were instrumental in persuading the Department of the Environment Inspector to reduce the building proposed on the triangle site to 10%. The Nature Conservancy is also interested in this site. A proposal had been put forward for a BMX cycle track for children at the Recreation ground.
